text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 1969 European Indoor Games was held on 9 March in Belgrade. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Edgard Salvé '''' |Knut Brustad '''' |Walter Wilkinson '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 from each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !!
